Grandma Please

By Zoe Omoragbon, Donovan Frazier, Connor Ellis, David Kim, Jasmine Hernandez, Natalie Chan, Michelle Zheng, Abby Choy, Florence Zhao, Klaritza Campos, Lauren Gager


▶  Play on itch.io

Grandma Please

Fall 2020 - ongoing
Tags: Adventure, Story, Visual Novel

Grandma, Please! is a survival and fantasy romance visual novel; featuring a nameable druid-in-training protagonist with 3 love interests and multiple endings.

Synopsis:
You have three days to to become a druid. Can you survive and pass your right of passage? A simple enough task until your grandmother leaves you in the Otherworld with a human (?) to protect, an annoying (not really) cat supernatural, and a grumpy vampire hungry for your blood. Make your choice, survive and date them at your own discretion. There are only a million ways to die and a few to achieve your goal.
